item.description:
If you used Groupon to purchase the ticket, call the ticket booth to book the ticket, and exchange your Groupon printouts with actual tickets at the white Boston Harbor Cruises ticket booth on the docks for actual tickets.

The Groupon for Thursday July 1st is for a 90 minute sunset cruise, a $22.00 value, now only $12.00. Anybody want to go on a cruise, say Thursday July 22nd at 7:00 pm? I've placed it as an event on the Nerd Fun calendar. Go to http://www.groupon.co... to purchase the Groupon.com.

After the Groupon is purchased, in a few days we all need to call Boston Harbor Cruises by phone at (617) 227-4321 to make a reservation for our Groupon and schedule our cruise for Thursday July 22nd. I expect that their phone lines will be tied up for the next couple of days. Or maybe during the week people can pop in to their ticket booth in front of Legal Seafoods and the Long Wharf Marriott next to the Aquarium and redeem the Groupon printouts there.



Sunset Cruise
Boston Harbor Cruises
Long Wharf, Boston, MA
7:00 pm - 8:30 pm
$20.00, 90 minutes

Summer is full swing, along with this summer's theme of exploring the Boston Harbor: by guided tour, by National Park Ranger and by speedboat (Codzilla scheduled, soon!). Join us as Nerd Fun relaxes on a Sunset Cruise. They recommend for people to be there at least a half hour in advance. We should be docked at Long Wharf by 8:30 pm.

From http://www.bostonharb...

"A spectacular sunset adds a whole new dimension to this 90-minute sightseeing tour. With this cruise you'll be introduced to all the history, sights and lore that Boston Harbor has to offer, plus you'll be on hand to witness the USS Constitution's sunset serenade as she fires her cannon and lowers her flag ceremoniously signaling the day's end".


Purchasing Tickets:

* Go to https://secure4.gatew...
* Select the 22nd of July.
* Confirm that the date for the 7:00 pm sunset cruise now says 7/22/2010
* Select 7:00 pm, and re-confirm you are purchasing the "Sunset Cruise Adult 7/22/2010 7:00 PM" ticket
* Complete transaction
* Update your RSVP on the Nerd Fun site so that people can see who is coming.
* Exchange your Groupon printouts with actual tickets at the white Boston Harbor Cruises ticket booth on the docks for actual tickets.

Where to meet:
The ship will depart at 7:00 pm. I'll be near the boarding gate starting at 6:15 pm. The organizer for this event, T.J. Maher, is 5 foot 7, with short brown hair, blue eyes, wearing a "Hello, My Name is T.J." nametag, and a red MEETUP sign will be attached to his messenger bag.

Anybody want to do a late dinner after? We should be pulling back into the dock at 8:30 pm.
